I can't isntall a .tar.gz can anyone hel: you gotta untar it... tar xzf filename.tar.gz, then you can deal with the files inside the archive.
there should be a configure file or a make file
run it as root using ./configure or ./executable-name. If you get an error, use sh instead... or follow the advice of these guys in here because .deb packages are easier to deal with.
